description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0, which would cause a ZeroDivisionError. Also fix the add function which is incorrectly multiplying instead of adding. Additionally, improve the divide function's docstring to include information about the ZeroDivisionError that will be raised when b is 0. - Fix add function to add instead of multiply

metadata.solution_description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0, which would cause a ZeroDivisionError. Also fix the add function which is incorrectly multiplying instead of adding. Additionally, improve the divide function's docstring to include information about the ZeroDivisionError that will be raised when b is 0.
